/usr/bin/c++      -fsigned-char -W -Wall -Werror=return-type -Werror=address -Werror=sequence-point -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wmissing-declarations -Wundef -Winit-self -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wsign-promo -Wno-narrowing -Wno-delete-non-virtual-dtor -Wno-array-bounds -Wno-aggressive-loop-optimizations -fdiagnostics-show-option -Wno-long-long -pthread -fomit-frame-pointer -msse -msse2 -msse3 -ffunction-sections -O3 -DNDEBUG  -DNDEBUG      CMakeFiles/opencv_visualisation.dir/opencv_visualisation.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/opencv_visualisation -rdynamic -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppc.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppi.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnpps.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcufft.so ../../lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.13 ../../lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.13 ../../lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.13 -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppc.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppi.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnpps.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/home/liangxu/temp/opencv-2.4.13/lib:
